title: Disney Princess Valentine's Day Animated Special - Once Upon a Tim
description:
Created by Pandamusk - http://www.twitter.com/Pandamusk
Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com

Get a Pandamusk poster at www.KindaFunny.com/store


Happy Valentine's Day! Once Upon a Tim...

Tim Gettys loves Disney princesses, but what happens when he gets them all


Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Special thanks to:
Kristine Steimer - http://www.twitter.com/Steimer
Veronica Belmont - http://www.twitter.com/Veronica
Laura Bailey - http://www.twitter.com/LauraBaileyVO

transcript_chunks.text: life is but when it's gone go there once was a prince from a far away land whose love life was a bit of a mess it seems like so off to a place of magic castles he went in search for his perfect princess he met strong girls ambitious girls Beauty fair and face adventurous girls with intellect so many princesses in one place he took them dancing and dining swept up in the tide of young love unfettered Magic Carpet Ride he showered them with gifts impressed them with his strength fought off all rivals for true love he would go to any length Our Fair Prince was Charming romantic and sweet from grand gestures to little things he swept them off their feet thus did the princess's love grow deeper with each date each wondering to themselves could Tim be their Perfect Mate but alas for our princesses a terrible flaw did he carried he couldn't make up his mind which princess he would marry for Tim loved his princesses each was cherished and dear he couldn't

Perfect Mate, but alas, for our princesses, a terrible flaw he carried. He couldn't make up his mind which princess he would marry. For Tim loved his princesses; each was cherished and dear. He couldn't give up on any, so the solution was clear. But no such behavior gets left unchecked. The princesses found out, and boy did he get what's coming to him. He's a cheating bastard! Baby, baby! This is not what it looks like, no, no, no! I love you; I love all of you, you dick! Wait a sec, hi Tiger Baba's just left for work, and the kids are at school. Why don't you come on over? Now's not a good time. Get him totally deleting you from Facebook. A bruised ego, a black eye, and more than one broken bone. He left the land of princesses to live out his days alone. There is no silver lining to this story or aid that is sunny. What such a sad ending for Tim? At least it was kind of funny, but when it's over, Love Goes On.
